title: Beautifully renovated 2 room/1 bath apartment with modern updates feat
posting_body: ['Beautifully renovated 2 room/1 bath apartment with modern updates features an updated kitchen', 'Listing ID #: 138395', 'Price: $5,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Brownstone', 'Subway', 'Diplomats OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Outdoor Space', 'Garden', 'Patio', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Free Rent', 'Available for September 1 occupancy, this beautifully renovated 2 room/1 bath apartment with modern updates features an updated kitchen (with dishwasher), and an in-unit washer and dryer.', 'Additional features include:Details: *private garden*exposed brick*stainless steel appliances*washer/dryer*modern bathroom*modern kitchen*dishwasher*hardwood floors*high ceilingsLocated in prime East Village area steps from shopping, nightlife and restaurants.', 'Just minutes to St Marks Place and centrally located between the F, L, N, R, 4, 5, and 6 subway lines.', 'Contact office for access.', 'Jason Paulino', 'Phone: (646) 300-2984', 'Mobile: (646) 300-2984', 'Fax: (212) 227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 FAX (212) 227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Jason Paulino at (646) 300-2984']
